name: GMQ: Undead Celebrities (Print Copy + Instant Digital Download)
description:
The "Undead Celebrities" issue of GhettoManga Quarterly is 64 pages, featuring a gallery of artists (including Mike Hawthorne, DTM Flores, Craig FLUX Singleton, and GoldiGold) resurrecting their favorite dearly departed icons for your viewing pleasure.
COMICS:
*"THRILLER" by Howard Russell- The greatest pop star the world has ever seen returns from the grave to fight evil.

*"Zombie Dickheads" Award-winning cartoonist Chris Moreno's clique of undead hipsters say no to brains, but you might still die laughing.

* "The  Retriever" Daniel Fu's genre-bending action comic continues, as Jackson Lau must take on gangsters to brings back his client's missing father.

PLUS:
Get our regular columns: BEGBORROWSTEAL (10 things you definitely need in your life), Corance's ("Top 5 Horror Movies for People Who Used to Love Horror Movies"), and the latest installment of "Movies That Should Be Comics" with art by that dude Khalid BigSteelo Robertson.

You'll get the digital download NOW and printed version mailed to your door!

name: Black Comix: African American Independent Comics, Art and Culture
description:
In light of the comics boom that has taken place over the past 10 years, the artists, writers and publishers that make up the vibrant African American independent comics community have remained relatively unknown – until now. Black Comix brings together an unprecedented collection of largely unheard of, and undeniably masterful, comics art while also framing the work of these men and women in a broader historical and cultural context.

Foreword by Keith Knight featuring art and interviews with over 50 contributors, including Phonzie Davis, Jan-Michael Franklin, Frances Liddell, Kenjji Marshall, Lance Tooks, Rob Stull, Ashley A. Woods and many, more, the cross section of comics genres represented includes manga, superheroes, humor, history, science fiction and fantasy. This book is a must-have for comics readers. 

11.5 x 9 Hardcover
Full Color

176 pages.

name: CARTOON PORTRAITS
description: Have a picture of yourself, a friend, or your favorite fictional or historical character turned into a cool cartoon drawing! Perfect for social media profile pics, avatars, and covers. Will include head and shoulders. (Upgrades to full body available upon request) Enter coupon code DIGITAL if you only want a digital copy (to waive shipping and handling fee), which will be emailed to you. Otherwise, you will also receive an original drawing on 8x11 cardstock mailed to your door. UPGRADES-$15 each (billed separately) *full-body drawing *extra props *background *color (watercolor and/or markers) *extra people *up-size to 11x14 or 11x17 Please contact us with any questions. Allow 3-4 weeks for delivery.

name: GhettoManga Quarterly: Sweet Christmas Special
description:
(includes INSTANT Digital Download AND Printed copy mailed to your door)

Time to pull out your yellow silk shirt and iron tiara! The GhettoManga Sweet Christmas Special features fan art, redesigns and commentary about Marvel's resurgent Blaxploitation holdover Luke Cage, also known as Powerman! Highlights include: 

*In-depth article "Understanding Luke Cage" by Jay Potts, author of the world's #1 Blaxploitation Webcomic, "World of Hurt". 
*Cage fan art gallery by a combination of established and up-and-coming artists! 
*Corance's Top 5 (candidates to play the Hero for Hire) 

PLUS: Never-before-printed comics by Zees Moreno (Mini Battle Men) & Dan Fu (The Retriever).

name: GhettoManga Quarterly: Undead Celebrities (Digital)
description:
This issue features a gallery of artists (including Mike Hawthorne, DTM Flores, Craig FLUX Singleton, and Goldi Gold) resurrecting their favorite dearly departed icons for your viewing pleasure.
Plus read these COMICS:
*"THRILLER" by Howard Russell- The greatest pop star the world has ever seen returns from the grave to fight evil.

*"Zombie Dickheads" Award-winning cartoonist Chris Moreno's clique of undead hipsters say no to brains, but you might still die laughing.

* "The  Retriever" Daniel Fu's genre-bending action comic continues, as Jackson Lau must take on gangsters to brings back his client's missing father.

PLUS:
Get our regular columns: BEGBORROWSTEAL:(10 things you definitely need in your life) , Corance's ("Top 5 Horror Movies for People Who Used to Love Horror Movies"), and the latest installment of "Movies That Should Be Comics" with art by that dude Khalid BigSteelo Robertson (Champion of Children, Steel Poobah, Off the Floor).

name: GhettoManga Quarterly: Manchild
description:
IN THIS ISSUE: *MANCHILD by Samax Amen- In this corner we have a pissed off three-year-old with a thirty eight revolver. In the other corner, we have a cybernetically enhanced retrieval team hellbent on bring the kid back to... whatever... 

*IF I WAS DICK by Joshua Boulet- Let me just say this: Dick Chaney is SO gangster... you don't even KNOW!!! 

*PYROTECHNIC PORNO BABIES: YETI SPERM by Brock Rizy - no, that's not a typo. There really is a comic in this issue starring the super-short geniuses that the mayor calls to tackle problems too OFFENSIVE for the regular authorities handle! 

We also have a review and an eight page preview of FELIPE SMITH'S groundbreaking culture clash manga PEEPO CHOO in our Right-to-Left section, courtesy of Verticle. 

All that PLUS Corance's Top 5, BegBorrowSteal, Movies That Should Be Comics, and more!

name: GhettoManga Quarterly: MF DOOM
description: DOOM has come to the pages of GhettoManga Quarterly! That's right, we're huge fans of the world's greatest rapping supervillain, the Mighty MF DOOM! To express our fealty to the masked man of mystery we've compiled a massive lineup of Indy artists including Charlie Goubile (Blackbird), Blackstar Shabach (Abraham the Young Lion) and Darnell Kiernon (Kids from the Ghetto). All that, Plus brand new comics from Nat Landry (Bring the Pain Jermaine) and STAUFF (Return To Krossepta).

name: GhettoManga Quarterly: Paytriotic
description:
The debut issue of GhettoManga Quarterly features original comics from Nat Landry (Devil Kitty and Violent Amphibious Beaver Boy), Garland Watson (Return Of The Backpackers) and Samax Amen (Manchild: Birthday Boy).

Hip hoppers will dig the article featuring DJ Kool Herc, the hip hop and comics reviews in our Beg:Borrow:Steal section. Also featured is the art series Pay*Triotic by Samax Amen and much, much more!

name: "Vampire Gary Coleman" Giclee Print
description: Straight from the pages of "Undead Celebrities" comes Samax Amen's illustration of eighties child star Gary Coleman, resurrected as a dapper vampire. This piece -easily the most popular image from the "Undead Celebrities" series- is now available as a 12" x 18" premium giclée print on high-quality paper stock.

name: "Ghost of Andre the Giant" Giclee Print
description: Straight from the pages of "Undead Celebrities" comes Samax Amen's illustration of iconic wrestling star Andre the Giant as a monolithic specter. This piece is now available as a 12" x 18" premium giclée print on high-quality paper stock.

name: "Thug Afterlife (2Pac)" Giclee Print
description: Straight from the pages of "Undead Celebrities" comes Samax Amen's illustration of legendary thug rapper Tupac Shakur. This piece is now available as a 12" x 18" premium giclée print on high-quality paper stock.

name: Album Cover Art
description: Album art starts at $300, which covers a full-color front cover image, a basic back cover with tracklist and titles (you can have your own graphic designer do the lettering if you want). Additional panels (full back cover, inside panels, full art for cd face,etc) are $50 each for basic panels with captions, or $150 each for full art. The purchase price here is paid up front, and the rest is paid when the project is completed. We can't refund your initial payment once work begins, so please contact us with all your questions before you pay.

name: De(a)f Jam Teeshirt by BigSteelo
description:
[EXTREMELY LIMITED!]

This item no longer in stock. The artist may have more in your size, so email Khalid.Steelo (at) gmail dot com and he can take care of you!

name: Lunaversoul Ladies Tee (PRE-ORDER)
description:
This nice white ladies' tee shirt features Samax Amen's portrait of jeweler and anime fan Camisha Jackson (Lunaversoul.com). The print run will be limited and the shirts will come signed and numbered by the artist.

The 100% pre-shrunk 6.0oz per square yard cotton has enough weight to conceal what's up under it. But still good and soft. A nice thick tee.

Taped neck and shoulder construction, plus the double needle stitching on sleeve and bottom hem, to make it hold up.

Seamless double needle 5/8" neck rib is narrower than your man's teeshirt. Don't worry. It'll make you look dainty!

This drawing was so popular, we wanted to make a teeshirt you could wear in different situations, with different outfits.

PRE-ORDER NOW and save a little bread! After pre-orders are over, any extras we order will sell for at least $30 plus shipping. And once THOSE are gone, they're gone!
